entry.title: Crown Wrap Planter With Faux Plant - Set Of Two
entry.summary:
Vendor: Coral Tree
Type: Pots & Planters
Price: 1299.00

With vibrant green leaves that never wilt and blooms that never fade, it's the perfect solution for adding a pop of greenery to your space without any of the hassle. Let your space be crowned with effortless style and botanical charm with this unique planter.

1. The product includes a set of 2 planters with atificial plants.
2. The size of the product is
Small: (6.4x6.4x5.5 inches) or (16.5x16.5x14 cms).
Large: (5.7x5.7x4.3 inches) or (14.5x14.5x11 cms)
3. The weight of the product is 500 gm.
4. The material of the product is metal.
5. Wipe with a soft, clean cloth.
